EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-05-23 Turbo 6.1 - Last Last Chance.Prospect Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Two Hours to Go! [Webinar] Using AI to Maximize Cloud Cost Savings
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-artificial-intelligence-to-cut-cloud-costs/?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiTm1abFpqWXdaVFl3WVRrMyIsInQiOiJkUXJWemFHKzd0QUdDQWJpanRsMytKZGg3c2ltNVBHaVdhZDl0bEJ3QlwvdGM3ZmtNN2V4M2wwRlhMeERVM2RnNVpIOUt1MFFOYitKRFNJdm9nVjFlWmc9PSJ9]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
I wanted to make sure you didn't miss out. This is your last chance to register for our live webinar today at 1 pm ET. Join Mor Cohen-Tal, our Cloud CTO, as she discusses Using AI to Continuously Maximize Cloud Cost Savings. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-artificial-intelligence-to-cut-cloud-costs/]]>
During the webinar, you will learn how to continuously optimize reserved instance utilization in concert with resizing automation – to drive the elasticity AND cost savings you want and expect from the cloud.
I hope you can join us!
Regards, Elizabeth
